title: General Overview
text:
Author: Thanh Dao
Last Updated: December 19th, 2024

title: General Overview
text:
Professional Experience
I am currently an Administrative Manager at Bao by Kaya, a Taiwanese eatery found in UrbanSpaces across Manhattan. My main responsibilities include the following:

Automating monthly expense reports to consolidate 140 expense sheets monthly, saving 300 hours yearly for upper management
Developing relationships with 15 third-party suppliers, resulting in $6,000 in yearly cost-savings for the distribution department
Overseeing front-of-house operations for 5 locations, including training and managing a team of 30 employees

I am also a Human Resources Assistant there, where I process payroll through reviewing time sheets and addressing discrepancies.



Our signature pork belly bao

title: General Overview
text:
Hobbies
In my free time, I volunteer at Astoria Cat Rescue, a non-profit organization that helps feed, house, and support the cat population in and around Astoria. There, I help prepare food for cats that are homeless, feral, or abandoned, and socialize the rescued cats to help them get used to humans and find their forever homes.



One of the rescued cats!


I also like to do arts and crafts; mainly, I decorate top loaders, draw, or create collages. You can find my art Instagram here. I also dabble in knitting and crochet, but I mainly stick to hats and scarves.



One of the top loaders Iâ€™ve decorated
